Package control

Class ApplicantControl

Object
ApplicantControl
public class ApplicantControl extends Object
The ApplicantControl class provides methods for handling actions that an applicant can perform, such as applying for projects, making enquiries, editing or deleting enquiries, and requesting withdrawal. It ensures that applicants can manage their applications and interact with projects within the system.

  • Constructor Details

    • ApplicantControl

      public ApplicantControl()

  • Method Details

    • applyForProject

      public static void applyForProject(Applicant applicant, List<Project> projects, Scanner sc, Data data)
      Allows an applicant to apply for a project. The method checks if the applicant is eligible to apply and handles the application process, including selecting a unit type if the applicant is married.
      Parameters:
      applicant - the applicant applying for the project
      projects - the list of available projects to apply for
      sc - the scanner object to read user input
      data - the data object containing the application data

    • getApplicableProjects

      public static List<Project> getApplicableProjects(Applicant applicant, Data data)
      Retrieves a list of projects that the applicant is eligible to apply for, based on their marital status and age. The method applies additional filters, including visibility and date range for the projects.
      Parameters:
      applicant - the applicant for whom the eligible projects are being retrieved
      data - the data object containing the project data
      Returns:
      a list of projects that the applicant can apply for

    • enquireAboutProject

      public static void enquireAboutProject(Applicant applicant, List<Project> projects, Scanner sc, Data data)
      Allows an applicant to make an enquiry about a project. The method prompts the applicant to provide a header and body for the enquiry, which is then added to the enquiry list.
      Parameters:
      applicant - the applicant making the enquiry
      projects - the list of available projects to enquire about
      sc - the scanner object to read user input
      data - the data object containing the enquiry data

    • editEnquiry

      public static void editEnquiry(Applicant applicant, Scanner sc, Data data)
      Allows an applicant to edit an existing enquiry. The applicant can modify the body of the enquiry, which is then updated in the system.
      Parameters:
      applicant - the applicant editing the enquiry
      sc - the scanner object to read user input
      data - the data object containing the enquiry data

    • deleteEnquiry

      public static void deleteEnquiry(Applicant applicant, Scanner sc, Data data)
      Allows an applicant to delete an existing enquiry. If the enquiry is successfully deleted, it is removed from the system and the applicant's list.
      Parameters:
      applicant - the applicant deleting the enquiry
      sc - the scanner object to read user input
      data - the data object containing the enquiry data

    • requestWithdrawal

      public static void requestWithdrawal(Applicant applicant, Scanner sc, Data data)
      Allows an applicant to request withdrawal from a project they have applied for. If the application is not booked, the withdrawal is processed, and a new withdrawal record is created. Otherwise, an error message is displayed.
      Parameters:
      applicant - the applicant requesting the withdrawal
      sc - the scanner object to read user input
      data - the data object containing the withdrawal data
